trans-unit.source: Provides the interface for all mobile control designers between the .NET framework and a design host such as Visual Studio 2005.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a interface para todos os designers de controle móvel entre o .NET Framework e um host de design como o Visual Studio 2005.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, consulte o site [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900).

trans-unit.source: This interface adds one method to the base designer interface: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.IMobileDesigner.UpdateRendering%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Essa interface adiciona um método de interface do designer de base: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.IMobileDesigner.UpdateRendering%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Updates design-time rendering for the container control that implements the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.IMobileDesigner" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza o processamento de tempo de design para o controle de contêiner que implementa a interface <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.IMobileDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, consulte o site [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900).
